subject: Meeting Tomorrow
body: Hi, just checking if we are still on for tomorrow's meeting about the project update. Let me know if the time still works for you.

subject: Offer Letter
body: We're pleased to inform you that we would like to offer you the position of Senior Developer. Attached is the formal offer letter with details.

subject: Weekly Newsletter
body: Here are this week's top stories and updates from our service. Check out our newest features!
